amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE IX ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 901. None of the funds made available in this Act to the Small Business Administration may be used for the West Virginia University Research Corporation for renovations of a small business incubator.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the West Virginia University Research Corporation for renovations of a small business incubator.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 325 (Roll no. 594).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
